result.title: Dynamic Programming
result.content:
It's what you've all been waiting for: DP!

Contest of week has been made here

It will be, 3 weeks of pure DP. So enjoy :)

Any nice problems that you do, please comment below :)

As for tutorials, everyone here should know basic idea in DP, but bitmask tutorial, DP in tree, please post tutorials on those.

Thanks,

minimario
